page.title: 03OUR FARM AT MICKLEY
page.content:
Our farm is on the North edge of the village. It has 200 acres. 130 acres is grass 46 of which will be made into hay and silage. We have 70 acres of corn,wheat and barley. We have 41 cattle which are sold fat and 120 mule ewes most with twin lambs and 3 Suffolk rams. We have 3 tractors,a Massey Ferguson 165, an International 475 and an International 785. We also have a combine harvester, a corn drier, a plough and lots of other machinery. My favourite season is Spring when I can help with the lambing. When I leave school I would like to be a farmer.
{Thomas Harrison Age 9}
